task: Коротко: как устроены агенты в KB Labs?

phases.name: Gather context about KB Labs agents
phases.description: Retrieve internal docs or notes about how agents are structured in KB Labs

steps.action: Search existing knowledge base for docs on KB Labs agents
steps.expectedOutcome: List of relevant documents or snippets describing agents in KB Labs

phases.name: Review and extract key points
phases.description: Open and read the most relevant materials to understand agent architecture and workflows

steps.action: Open top relevant files/snippets from the search results for detailed review
steps.expectedOutcome: Collected notes on agent structure, components, and flow in KB Labs

phases.name: Draft concise explanation
phases.description: Summarize findings into a short, clear description of how agents are organized in KB Labs

steps.action: Write the concise summary in a new file or buffer
steps.expectedOutcome: Draft summary explaining how agents are structured in KB Labs

phases.name: Review and finalize
phases.description: Sanity-check and polish the short explanation for clarity and accuracy

steps.action: Edit draft for clarity and completeness
steps.expectedOutcome: Final concise explanation ready to share
